columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique UUID identifier for the wind farm.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The human-readable name of the wind farm.

columns.name: installed_capacity_pos
columns.description: The positive installed capacity in kW.

columns.name: metering_identifiers
columns.description: A list of metering point identifiers.

columns.name: wind_farm_properties
columns.description: Contains physical properties like hub height.

columns.name: valid_from
columns.description: The start date of the record's validity.

columns.name: valid_to
columns.description: The end date of the record's validity.
